On-demand backup power for any facility. Whether the grid fails you at one location or several, Agility’s flexible deployment options mean generator delivery directly to your location and connected by a licensed electrician faster than from any other provider. An Agility membership helps you avoid surge pricing, equipment shortages, and stress by reserving the power and support you need today no matter what happens tomorrow and beyond.

Internet Connectivity

# Stay Connected and Operational. No Matter the Disaster.

When disaster strikes, connection is your lifeline. Agility Recovery delivers resilient broadband, satellite, and LTE communication solutions designed to keep your organization online, operational, and compliant — even when traditional networks fail.

## Broadband Connections Built for **The Demands of Your Business**

When every second matters, your business can’t afford downtime. Agility’s broadband recovery solutions ensure uninterrupted data access, communication, and operations, whether you’re recovering a data center, reestablishing a call center, or supporting remote teams.

### Satellite Communications

Always-on connections with minimal line-of-sight barriers, built to perform through severe weather and infrastructure damage

### LTE & 5G Hotspots

Rapid-deploy mobile networks that enable immediate remote or field connectivity

### Backup Broadband Services

High-speed, low-latency connections (up to 350 Mbps, 20–40ms latency) supporting critical workloads and compliance needs

## Dependable Connection. Rapid Recovery.

Agility’s connectivity recovery services accompany [power](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/power/) and [workspace solutions](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/workspace-recovery/) to provide high-bandwidth, low-latency internet and VoIP connectivity so your teams can keep the business running.

* Nationwide coverage with immediate **deployment to any site**, urban, rural, or remote
* **Simple** **setup** of lightweight hardware and connection configuration
* **Unmatched reliability** performs through storms, floods, and power outages
* Around-the-clock support with **24/7/365** access to our U.S.-based recovery experts
* Proven track record of **34+ years restoring operations for thousands of organizations**

[Reserve Backup Internet](https://agilityrecovery.com/discuss-disaster-recovery/)

Risk Planning & Testing [...] ### KVM-IP Remote Test

Agility will set up a workstation stocked with a sample of your contracted backup equipment (servers, desktops, etc.) and allow your team to remotely access the equipment via a secure KVM/IP network connection so you can perform connectivity tests and check essential business applications.

### Business Recovery Center Test

Conduct your test at a remote mobile testing center with all necessary equipment in the exact environment used for recovery to ensure your solution is perfectly tailored to your business at the time of need. Remote mobile testing centers are in College Station, TX, and Northborough, MA.

### Plan Review

## High-Speed Connectivity, Anywhere

Stay online through any outage with high-bandwidth satellite and 5G connectivity. Agility delivers secure, resilient internet built for mission-critical operations, keeping your teams connected even when local networks fail.

Talk About Connectivity

## Data Recovery for Every Device & System

Effortlessly recover data from every endpoint and server with Agility’s comprehensive backup data and recovery solutions. From laptops to mission-critical infrastructure, we ensure rapid restoration of your enterprise data so your business stays operational through any disruption.

Explore Data Recovery Solutions

### Pre-Configured and Ready to Use [...] Get Started

## Frequently Asked Questions

What technology recovery and equipment services does Agility offer?-
:   Agility provides technology and equipment recovery solutions including secure internet connectivity, data and device recovery, replacement hardware deployment, and IT infrastructure support to keep work flowing during disruptions.

How does Agility support connectivity during an outage?+
:   Agility delivers secure connectivity options such as portable internet and redundant network solutions so employees can stay connected and productive even when primary systems or infrastructure are down. [...] Can Agility support hybrid work and remote teams?+
:   Yes. Agility’s technology and equipment solutions are designed to support hybrid and remote work models, providing the tools, connectivity, and hardware needed to keep distributed teams productive during disruptions.

# Prepared for Every Possibility

From cyber threats to severe weather, workplace unrest to planned outages — every organization faces risks that can halt operations. Agility helps you anticipate, withstand, and recover from the unexpected with purpose-built continuity and recovery solutions.

## No Two Disruptions Are the Same — But Every One Deserves a Plan

Agility supports organizations through the full spectrum of disruption scenarios, both planned and unplanned. Whether it’s protecting sensitive data during a cyberattack, maintaining operations through a power outage, or ensuring employee safety during local unrest, our solutions are built to restore business continuity when it matters most.

## Frequently Asked Questions

What is business continuity planning for healthcare organizations?-
:   Business continuity planning for healthcare means preparing strategies and solutions to ensure critical care delivery, patient safety, and operational systems continue running during disruptions like power outages, natural disasters, or cyber incidents. It helps minimize risk and protect lives when the unexpected happens.

Why is business continuity important for hospitals and clinics?+
:   In healthcare, even short interruptions can impact patient care, regulatory compliance (e.g., HIPAA, CMS), and reputation. A continuity plan ensures critical systems, such as life-safety equipment, electronic health records, and communication channels, stay functional and compliant.

Disaster Recovery

# Be Ready for Any Disaster or Operational Disruption

Fast, dependable, and economical disaster recovery plans the deliver restoration of power, workspace, technology, and operations in a turn-key, on-demand fashion. Agility ensures that your organization stays resilient, responsive, and fully functional through outages, crises, and unexpected disruptions.

#### Let’s Build the Perfect Disaster Recovery Plan.

## Backup Power

On-demand backup power for any facility. Whether the grid fails you at one location or several, Agility’s flexible deployment options mean generator delivery directly to your location and connected by a licensed electrician faster than from any other provider. An Agility membership helps you avoid surge pricing, equipment shortages, and stress by reserving the power and support you need today no matter what happens tomorrow and beyond.

Explore Backup Power

## Workspace Recovery

  + Contact Us [...] Working with the right business continuity and disaster recovery services partner empowers you to safeguard the well-being of your employees, fulfill the expectations of your customers, and continue serving your community. With more than 35 years of experience providing innovative solutions to help businesses recover faster, Agility is the partner you want beside you in a crisis.

## Our History

Agility Recovery started as the disaster recovery and business continuity division of General Electric in 1989, delivering temporary power, workspace, and technology solutions to keep critical operations running during crises.

## Manufacturing

Manufacturers know that revenue stops and costs climb without near-continuous production, reliable power, and IT system connectivity. Agility delivers turnkey solutions that keep lines running and shrink the risk of costly downtime, no matter the risk.

## Logistics

The business of moving goods at scale requires power and communications continuity across your entire supply chain. Supply chain and logistics interruptions are costly and painful. No matter where in North America your goods move, Agility can assure backup power and connectivity for your infrastructure.

## Planning & Testing

Agility’s planning and testing services are the assurance behind your disaster recovery plan. We help you uncover vulnerabilities through detailed risk analysis, create continuity plans tailored to your business, validate defenses with penetration testing, and prove compliance with industry regulations so resilience isn’t a guess, it’s proven.

Explore Planning & Testing Solutions

## Technology Recovery

From restoring internet connectivity and strengthening cybersecurity resilience to protecting critical data with secure backups and delivering replacement IT hardware, Agility provides end-to-end technology recovery to keep your people connected and your business running.

Explore Technology Solutions

Internet Connectivity

# Stay Connected and Operational. No Matter the Disaster.

When disaster strikes, connection is your lifeline. Agility Recovery delivers resilient broadband, satellite, and LTE communication solutions designed to keep your organization online, operational, and compliant — even when traditional networks fail.

## Broadband Connections Built for **The Demands of Your Business**

When every second matters, your business can’t afford downtime. Agility’s broadband recovery solutions ensure uninterrupted data access, communication, and operations, whether you’re recovering a data center, reestablishing a call center, or supporting remote teams.

### Satellite Communications

Always-on connections with minimal line-of-sight barriers, built to perform through severe weather and infrastructure damage

### LTE & 5G Hotspots

Rapid-deploy mobile networks that enable immediate remote or field connectivity

### Backup Broadband Services

High-speed, low-latency connections (up to 350 Mbps, 20–40ms latency) supporting critical workloads and compliance needs

## Dependable Connection. Rapid Recovery.

Agility’s connectivity recovery services accompany [power](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/power/) and [workspace solutions](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/workspace-recovery/) to provide high-bandwidth, low-latency internet and VoIP connectivity so your teams can keep the business running.

* Nationwide coverage with immediate **deployment to any site**, urban, rural, or remote
* **Simple** **setup** of lightweight hardware and connection configuration
* **Unmatched reliability** performs through storms, floods, and power outages
* Around-the-clock support with **24/7/365** access to our U.S.-based recovery experts
* Proven track record of **34+ years restoring operations for thousands of organizations**

[Reserve Backup Internet](https://agilityrecovery.com/discuss-disaster-recovery/)

# Continuity Solutions That Enhance Cybersecurity & Resilience

## Breach Response & Recovery

Contain, investigate, and recover from cyber incidents with a dedicated incident response team on call 24×7. Agility coordinates triage, forensics, remediation, and recovery support to minimize downtime and restore operations quickly and confidently.

Discuss Breach Response Needs

## Risk Assessment & Impact Analysis

Understand how cyber threats could impact your operations and revenue. From readiness assessments to ransomware impact modeling, we help you measure exposure, prioritize investments, and plan with confidence before an incident occurs.

Explore Risk Assessments

Risk Planning & Testing [...] ### KVM-IP Remote Test

Agility will set up a workstation stocked with a sample of your contracted backup equipment (servers, desktops, etc.) and allow your team to remotely access the equipment via a secure KVM/IP network connection so you can perform connectivity tests and check essential business applications.

### Business Recovery Center Test

Conduct your test at a remote mobile testing center with all necessary equipment in the exact environment used for recovery to ensure your solution is perfectly tailored to your business at the time of need. Remote mobile testing centers are in College Station, TX, and Northborough, MA.

# Prepared for Every Possibility

From cyber threats to severe weather, workplace unrest to planned outages — every organization faces risks that can halt operations. Agility helps you anticipate, withstand, and recover from the unexpected with purpose-built continuity and recovery solutions.

## No Two Disruptions Are the Same — But Every One Deserves a Plan

Agility supports organizations through the full spectrum of disruption scenarios, both planned and unplanned. Whether it’s protecting sensitive data during a cyberattack, maintaining operations through a power outage, or ensuring employee safety during local unrest, our solutions are built to restore business continuity when it matters most.

## Frequently Asked Questions

What is business continuity planning for healthcare organizations?-
:   Business continuity planning for healthcare means preparing strategies and solutions to ensure critical care delivery, patient safety, and operational systems continue running during disruptions like power outages, natural disasters, or cyber incidents. It helps minimize risk and protect lives when the unexpected happens.

Why is business continuity important for hospitals and clinics?+
:   In healthcare, even short interruptions can impact patient care, regulatory compliance (e.g., HIPAA, CMS), and reputation. A continuity plan ensures critical systems, such as life-safety equipment, electronic health records, and communication channels, stay functional and compliant.

https://maritime-executive.com/corporate.content: Compass Logistics & Marine (CLM), a U.S.-based international freight forwarder and licensed customs broker, is pleased to announce the appointment of Lina Trujillo as Business Development & Partnerships Manager, effective January 13, 2026. CLM’s reputation within international networks is exceptional, and I look forward to contributing to its continued growth by strengthening relationships and unlocking new opportunities across markets.”. “Following a year of strong international growth and recognition as Global Affinity Alliance (GAA) Best Partner of the Year, we are entering 2026 with a clear focus on expanding our global network and deepening strategic partnerships,” said Danny James, Founder and CEO of Compass Logistics & Marine.

https://thefintechtimes.com/riyadh-air-a.title: Riyadh Air and Mastercard Forge Strategic Alliance to Launch ‘Digital-First’ Payment Ecosystem - The Fintech Times
https://thefintechtimes.com/riyadh-air-a.content: * Riyadh Air and Mastercard Forge Strategic Alliance to Launch ‘Digital-First’ Payment Ecosystem. # Riyadh Air and Mastercard Forge Strategic Alliance to Launch ‘Digital-First’ Payment Ecosystem. #### ***Riyadh Air**, Saudi Arabia’s new digitally-native national carrier, has entered into a major strategic partnership with **Mastercard** to develop a comprehensive financial and payments ecosystem for the airline.*. The collaboration will result in the launch of Riyadh Air-branded Mastercard credit and prepaid cards, set to roll out to Saudi residents in late 2026. On the B2B front, the partnership plans to introduce an airline-branded virtual card program for travel trade settlements—a move Riyadh Air claims is a global first for an airline. **Dr. Dimitrios Dosis**, president, Eastern Europe, Middle East and Africa at Mastercard, said: “Together with Riyadh Air, we are creating an integrated digitally-native ecosystem that delivers value at every touchpoint—for guests, travel agents, airlines and hospitality partners—while reinforcing Saudi Arabia’s role as a global travel hub.”. ##### Riyadh Air and Mastercard Forge Strategic Alliance to Launch ‘Digital-First’ Payment Ecosystem.

https://www.aninews.in/news/business/fm-.title: FM Sitharaman outlines Union Budget 2026-27 priorities at US-India Strategic Partnership Forum meet - ANI News
https://www.aninews.in/news/business/fm-.content: #### FM Sitharaman outlines Union Budget 2026-27 priorities at US-India Strategic Partnership Forum meet. New Delhi [India], February 10 (ANI): Union Minister for Finance and Corporate Affairs Nirmala Sitharaman shared the key priorities and reform direction of the Union Budget 2026-27, with a focus on policy stability, manufacturing growth and long-term investment. The minister on Monday, addressed the Board Members of the US-India Strategic Partnership Forum in New Delhi and shared the budget priorities. According to a social media post by the Ministry of Finance, the meeting focused on strengthening India-US economic engagement and sharing the outcomes and intent of the Union Budget. The ministry said the interaction underlined the government's broader objective of creating a predictable and stable policy environment to encourage businesses and industry to plan long-term investments. Outlining the key tenets of the Union Budget 2026-27, Finance Minister Sitharaman said that under the leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, the Budget reflects the government's commitment to continuity, certainty and predictability from a policy perspective.

http://manufacturingglobal.com/news/qad-.title: QAD & TCS: Scaling Manufacturing AI Without the ERP Burden - Manufacturing Digital
http://manufacturingglobal.com/news/qad-.content: # QAD & TCS: Scaling Manufacturing AI Without the ERP Burden. QAD and TCS aim to bridge the execution gap, moving mid-market manufacturers from pilot success to enterprise results without disruption. QAD has announced a strategic partnership with Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) designed to help mid-market manufacturers modernise operations and deploy AI at enterprise scale. The alliance combines QAD's execution-first manufacturing platform with TCS's global manufacturing footprint and industrialised delivery model. The partnership directly targets mid-market manufacturers running legacy ERP environments who want alternatives to costly, complex upgrade programmes, including those facing large-scale legacy platform transitions. TCS will serve as a strategic engineering partner for QAD, augmenting product development and ERP execution with specialised manufacturing and cloud expertise. “The combination of TCS’ manufacturing expertise, scale and award-winning service delivery and QAD | Redzone’s execution-focused platform and Champion AI will enable them to modernize operations faster, smarter and with less disruption to operations.”.

## Our History

Agility Recovery started as the disaster recovery and business continuity division of General Electric in 1989, delivering temporary power, workspace, and technology solutions to keep critical operations running during crises.

Internet Connectivity

# Stay Connected and Operational. No Matter the Disaster.

When disaster strikes, connection is your lifeline. Agility Recovery delivers resilient broadband, satellite, and LTE communication solutions designed to keep your organization online, operational, and compliant — even when traditional networks fail.

## Broadband Connections Built for **The Demands of Your Business**

When every second matters, your business can’t afford downtime. Agility’s broadband recovery solutions ensure uninterrupted data access, communication, and operations, whether you’re recovering a data center, reestablishing a call center, or supporting remote teams.

### Satellite Communications

Always-on connections with minimal line-of-sight barriers, built to perform through severe weather and infrastructure damage

### LTE & 5G Hotspots

Rapid-deploy mobile networks that enable immediate remote or field connectivity

### Backup Broadband Services

High-speed, low-latency connections (up to 350 Mbps, 20–40ms latency) supporting critical workloads and compliance needs

## Dependable Connection. Rapid Recovery.

Agility’s connectivity recovery services accompany [power](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/power/) and [workspace solutions](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/workspace-recovery/) to provide high-bandwidth, low-latency internet and VoIP connectivity so your teams can keep the business running.

* Nationwide coverage with immediate **deployment to any site**, urban, rural, or remote
* **Simple** **setup** of lightweight hardware and connection configuration
* **Unmatched reliability** performs through storms, floods, and power outages
* Around-the-clock support with **24/7/365** access to our U.S.-based recovery experts
* Proven track record of **34+ years restoring operations for thousands of organizations**

Agility will set up a workstation stocked with a sample of your contracted backup equipment (servers, desktops, etc.) and allow your team to remotely access the equipment via a secure KVM/IP network connection so you can perform connectivity tests and check essential business applications.

### Business Recovery Center Test

Conduct your test at a remote mobile testing center with all necessary equipment in the exact environment used for recovery to ensure your solution is perfectly tailored to your business at the time of need. Remote mobile testing centers are in College Station, TX, and Northborough, MA.

# Prepared for Every Possibility

From cyber threats to severe weather, workplace unrest to planned outages — every organization faces risks that can halt operations. Agility helps you anticipate, withstand, and recover from the unexpected with purpose-built continuity and recovery solutions.

## No Two Disruptions Are the Same — But Every One Deserves a Plan

Agility supports organizations through the full spectrum of disruption scenarios, both planned and unplanned. Whether it’s protecting sensitive data during a cyberattack, maintaining operations through a power outage, or ensuring employee safety during local unrest, our solutions are built to restore business continuity when it matters most.

## Frequently Asked Questions

What is business continuity planning for healthcare organizations?-
:   Business continuity planning for healthcare means preparing strategies and solutions to ensure critical care delivery, patient safety, and operational systems continue running during disruptions like power outages, natural disasters, or cyber incidents. It helps minimize risk and protect lives when the unexpected happens.

Why is business continuity important for hospitals and clinics?+
:   In healthcare, even short interruptions can impact patient care, regulatory compliance (e.g., HIPAA, CMS), and reputation. A continuity plan ensures critical systems, such as life-safety equipment, electronic health records, and communication channels, stay functional and compliant.

Internet Connectivity

# Stay Connected and Operational. No Matter the Disaster.

When disaster strikes, connection is your lifeline. Agility Recovery delivers resilient broadband, satellite, and LTE communication solutions designed to keep your organization online, operational, and compliant — even when traditional networks fail.

## Broadband Connections Built for **The Demands of Your Business**

When every second matters, your business can’t afford downtime. Agility’s broadband recovery solutions ensure uninterrupted data access, communication, and operations, whether you’re recovering a data center, reestablishing a call center, or supporting remote teams.

### Satellite Communications

Always-on connections with minimal line-of-sight barriers, built to perform through severe weather and infrastructure damage

### LTE & 5G Hotspots

Rapid-deploy mobile networks that enable immediate remote or field connectivity

### Backup Broadband Services

High-speed, low-latency connections (up to 350 Mbps, 20–40ms latency) supporting critical workloads and compliance needs

## Dependable Connection. Rapid Recovery.

Agility’s connectivity recovery services accompany [power](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/power/) and [workspace solutions](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/workspace-recovery/) to provide high-bandwidth, low-latency internet and VoIP connectivity so your teams can keep the business running.

* Nationwide coverage with immediate **deployment to any site**, urban, rural, or remote
* **Simple** **setup** of lightweight hardware and connection configuration
* **Unmatched reliability** performs through storms, floods, and power outages
* Around-the-clock support with **24/7/365** access to our U.S.-based recovery experts
* Proven track record of **34+ years restoring operations for thousands of organizations**

Risk Planning & Testing [...] ### KVM-IP Remote Test

Agility will set up a workstation stocked with a sample of your contracted backup equipment (servers, desktops, etc.) and allow your team to remotely access the equipment via a secure KVM/IP network connection so you can perform connectivity tests and check essential business applications.

### Business Recovery Center Test

Conduct your test at a remote mobile testing center with all necessary equipment in the exact environment used for recovery to ensure your solution is perfectly tailored to your business at the time of need. Remote mobile testing centers are in College Station, TX, and Northborough, MA.

# Prepared for Every Possibility

From cyber threats to severe weather, workplace unrest to planned outages — every organization faces risks that can halt operations. Agility helps you anticipate, withstand, and recover from the unexpected with purpose-built continuity and recovery solutions.

## No Two Disruptions Are the Same — But Every One Deserves a Plan

Agility supports organizations through the full spectrum of disruption scenarios, both planned and unplanned. Whether it’s protecting sensitive data during a cyberattack, maintaining operations through a power outage, or ensuring employee safety during local unrest, our solutions are built to restore business continuity when it matters most.

## Frequently Asked Questions

What is business continuity planning for healthcare organizations?-
:   Business continuity planning for healthcare means preparing strategies and solutions to ensure critical care delivery, patient safety, and operational systems continue running during disruptions like power outages, natural disasters, or cyber incidents. It helps minimize risk and protect lives when the unexpected happens.

Why is business continuity important for hospitals and clinics?+
:   In healthcare, even short interruptions can impact patient care, regulatory compliance (e.g., HIPAA, CMS), and reputation. A continuity plan ensures critical systems, such as life-safety equipment, electronic health records, and communication channels, stay functional and compliant.

Internet Connectivity

# Stay Connected and Operational. No Matter the Disaster.

When disaster strikes, connection is your lifeline. Agility Recovery delivers resilient broadband, satellite, and LTE communication solutions designed to keep your organization online, operational, and compliant — even when traditional networks fail.

## Broadband Connections Built for **The Demands of Your Business**

When every second matters, your business can’t afford downtime. Agility’s broadband recovery solutions ensure uninterrupted data access, communication, and operations, whether you’re recovering a data center, reestablishing a call center, or supporting remote teams.

### Satellite Communications

Always-on connections with minimal line-of-sight barriers, built to perform through severe weather and infrastructure damage

### LTE & 5G Hotspots

Rapid-deploy mobile networks that enable immediate remote or field connectivity

### Backup Broadband Services

High-speed, low-latency connections (up to 350 Mbps, 20–40ms latency) supporting critical workloads and compliance needs

## Dependable Connection. Rapid Recovery.

Agility’s connectivity recovery services accompany [power](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/power/) and [workspace solutions](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/workspace-recovery/) to provide high-bandwidth, low-latency internet and VoIP connectivity so your teams can keep the business running.

* Nationwide coverage with immediate **deployment to any site**, urban, rural, or remote
* **Simple** **setup** of lightweight hardware and connection configuration
* **Unmatched reliability** performs through storms, floods, and power outages
* Around-the-clock support with **24/7/365** access to our U.S.-based recovery experts
* Proven track record of **34+ years restoring operations for thousands of organizations**

[Reserve Backup Internet](https://agilityrecovery.com/discuss-disaster-recovery/)

Risk Planning & Testing [...] ### KVM-IP Remote Test

Agility will set up a workstation stocked with a sample of your contracted backup equipment (servers, desktops, etc.) and allow your team to remotely access the equipment via a secure KVM/IP network connection so you can perform connectivity tests and check essential business applications.

### Business Recovery Center Test

Conduct your test at a remote mobile testing center with all necessary equipment in the exact environment used for recovery to ensure your solution is perfectly tailored to your business at the time of need. Remote mobile testing centers are in College Station, TX, and Northborough, MA.

Can a workspace recovery solution be customized for specific business needs?+

Are these workspaces compliant and secure?+
:   Workspace recovery solutions are designed to be code compliant and secure, with support for connectivity and technology integration that keeps communication and operations flowing even during infrastructure challenges.

# Prepared for Every Possibility

From cyber threats to severe weather, workplace unrest to planned outages — every organization faces risks that can halt operations. Agility helps you anticipate, withstand, and recover from the unexpected with purpose-built continuity and recovery solutions.

## No Two Disruptions Are the Same — But Every One Deserves a Plan

Agility supports organizations through the full spectrum of disruption scenarios, both planned and unplanned. Whether it’s protecting sensitive data during a cyberattack, maintaining operations through a power outage, or ensuring employee safety during local unrest, our solutions are built to restore business continuity when it matters most.

## Frequently Asked Questions

What is business continuity planning for healthcare organizations?-
:   Business continuity planning for healthcare means preparing strategies and solutions to ensure critical care delivery, patient safety, and operational systems continue running during disruptions like power outages, natural disasters, or cyber incidents. It helps minimize risk and protect lives when the unexpected happens.

Why is business continuity important for hospitals and clinics?+
:   In healthcare, even short interruptions can impact patient care, regulatory compliance (e.g., HIPAA, CMS), and reputation. A continuity plan ensures critical systems, such as life-safety equipment, electronic health records, and communication channels, stay functional and compliant.

https://agilityrecovery.com/blog/agility.content: Over the years, they have been working closely with core providers to deliver audit-ready testing, reporting, and recovery services, which help banking customers achieve stronger FFIEC compliance and resiliency as part of their business continuity program. Today's acquisition marks the third acquisition in less than two years, while Agility continues to enhance our end-to-end business continuity solution, making it simple, yet comprehensive, for our customers to do business with one partner. In December 2018, we added Rentsys to further expand the flexibility and footprint of workspace recovery solutions, which has allowed us to better serve customers and offer even faster RTOs. We've rapidly expanded to provide the industry's only comprehensive business continuity solution, which helps organizations plan, train, test, alert, and recover – all in one simple solution. Over the last 30 years, we’ve partnered with banks and credit unions to understand their unique business continuity needs and provide tailored recovery services to help them achieve their desired business outcomes while staying audit-ready.

https://www.ruleof78.com/about-us/prior-.title: Agility Recovery Solutions - Charlotte, Denver, Boulder | Rule of 78
https://www.ruleof78.com/about-us/prior-.content: Agility Recovery Solutions was started by General Electric (GE) in 1989 to provide computer systems and assets in the disaster recovery industry. After careful analysis of the potential business and scale opportunities, the Boyds launched an aggressive effort to become the undisputed leader in the disaster recovery industry and targeted small and medium sized businesses which had traditionally been completely ignored as potential buyers of disaster recovery services. Agility is widely recognized as the industry and thought leader in the disaster recovery industry in North America, and has successfully recovered over 1,000 organizations. The successful buyers of Agility, LLR Partners, recognized the exceptional management team, pricing model, diverse customer base, market opportunity and operational excellence that Agility had established. Bob Boyd was a finalist for the 2015 Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year for his work leading Agility and the remarkable growth of the business. This was a remarkable honor for Bob especially since Bill Boyd won the E&Y Entrepreneur of the Year award for his work at Muzak.

Agility Recovery started as the disaster recovery and business continuity division of General Electric in 1989, delivering temporary power, workspace, and technology solutions to keep critical operations running during crises.

## Manufacturing

Manufacturers know that revenue stops and costs climb without near-continuous production, reliable power, and IT system connectivity. Agility delivers turnkey solutions that keep lines running and shrink the risk of costly downtime, no matter the risk.

Learn About Manufacturing Resilience

## Logistics

The business of moving goods at scale requires power and communications continuity across your entire supply chain. Supply chain and logistics interruptions are costly and painful. No matter where in North America your goods move, Agility can assure backup power and connectivity for your infrastructure.

Explore Logistics and Distribution Solutions

Internet Connectivity

# Stay Connected and Operational. No Matter the Disaster.

When disaster strikes, connection is your lifeline. Agility Recovery delivers resilient broadband, satellite, and LTE communication solutions designed to keep your organization online, operational, and compliant — even when traditional networks fail.

## Broadband Connections Built for **The Demands of Your Business**

When every second matters, your business can’t afford downtime. Agility’s broadband recovery solutions ensure uninterrupted data access, communication, and operations, whether you’re recovering a data center, reestablishing a call center, or supporting remote teams.

### Satellite Communications

Always-on connections with minimal line-of-sight barriers, built to perform through severe weather and infrastructure damage

### LTE & 5G Hotspots

Rapid-deploy mobile networks that enable immediate remote or field connectivity

### Backup Broadband Services

High-speed, low-latency connections (up to 350 Mbps, 20–40ms latency) supporting critical workloads and compliance needs

## Dependable Connection. Rapid Recovery.

Agility’s connectivity recovery services accompany [power](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/power/) and [workspace solutions](https://agilityrecovery.com/solutions/workspace-recovery/) to provide high-bandwidth, low-latency internet and VoIP connectivity so your teams can keep the business running.

* Nationwide coverage with immediate **deployment to any site**, urban, rural, or remote
* **Simple** **setup** of lightweight hardware and connection configuration
* **Unmatched reliability** performs through storms, floods, and power outages
* Around-the-clock support with **24/7/365** access to our U.S.-based recovery experts
* Proven track record of **34+ years restoring operations for thousands of organizations**

[Reserve Backup Internet](https://agilityrecovery.com/discuss-disaster-recovery/)

Risk Planning & Testing [...] ### KVM-IP Remote Test

Agility will set up a workstation stocked with a sample of your contracted backup equipment (servers, desktops, etc.) and allow your team to remotely access the equipment via a secure KVM/IP network connection so you can perform connectivity tests and check essential business applications.

### Business Recovery Center Test

Conduct your test at a remote mobile testing center with all necessary equipment in the exact environment used for recovery to ensure your solution is perfectly tailored to your business at the time of need. Remote mobile testing centers are in College Station, TX, and Northborough, MA.

# Prepared for Every Possibility

From cyber threats to severe weather, workplace unrest to planned outages — every organization faces risks that can halt operations. Agility helps you anticipate, withstand, and recover from the unexpected with purpose-built continuity and recovery solutions.

## No Two Disruptions Are the Same — But Every One Deserves a Plan

Agility supports organizations through the full spectrum of disruption scenarios, both planned and unplanned. Whether it’s protecting sensitive data during a cyberattack, maintaining operations through a power outage, or ensuring employee safety during local unrest, our solutions are built to restore business continuity when it matters most.

## Frequently Asked Questions

What is business continuity planning for healthcare organizations?-
:   Business continuity planning for healthcare means preparing strategies and solutions to ensure critical care delivery, patient safety, and operational systems continue running during disruptions like power outages, natural disasters, or cyber incidents. It helps minimize risk and protect lives when the unexpected happens.

Why is business continuity important for hospitals and clinics?+
:   In healthcare, even short interruptions can impact patient care, regulatory compliance (e.g., HIPAA, CMS), and reputation. A continuity plan ensures critical systems, such as life-safety equipment, electronic health records, and communication channels, stay functional and compliant.

https://secureframe.com/blog/soc-2-trust.title: SOC 2® Trust Principles: Picking the Right Attestation
https://secureframe.com/blog/soc-2-trust.content: The American Institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA) developed SOC 2 around five trust principles: security, availability, processing integrity, confidentiality, and privacy. Trust principles were established by the AICPA in 2016 to evaluate and report on an organization’s relevant controls for information and systems in order to assess their SOC 2 compliance. During a SOC 2 examination, an auditor would then evaluate the suitability of the design and/or operating effectiveness of the system controls intended to meet the criteria for the relevant trust services principles. In that case, a complete set of SOC 2 criteria may consist only of the common criteria, used to test the security trust services principle. The SOC 2 trust principles are security, availability, processing integrity, confidentiality, and privacy. Security is generally the one trust services principle that must be covered in a SOC 2 report. How many trust principles you included in your SOC 2 audit depends on the services you provide to your customers.

https://agilityrecovery.com/article/topi.content: The Basel Committee on Banking Supervision, for example, defines operational resilience as “the ability of a bank to deliver critical operations through disruption.” A more vertical-agnostic definition is one by Protiviti, which defines operational resilience as the “ability of an organization to withstand adverse changes in its operating environment and continue the delivery of business services and economic functions.” Organizations can accomplish operational resilience by building resilience into processes and assets, such as within personnel, third-party service providers, communications, physical infrastructure (structure and recovery), data (backup and replication), power, cyber resilience, telecommunications, change management, and resumption of operations as built into the FFIEC BCM framework . As new threats emerge, guidelines are revised, the needs of the organization change, and business continuity management evolves, those organizations using software will find it easier, more efficient, and more cost effective to revise their plans and programs to meet those demands as well as address and implement the various elements of BCM and crisis response.

persona.mission_statement: To empower organizations to anticipate, withstand, and recover from disruptions, ensuring business continuity and safeguarding operations for employees, customers, and communities.

core_products.name: Backup Power
core_products.description: On-demand backup power solutions, including generator delivery and support, to ensure facilities remain operational during grid failures and avoid surge pricing.

core_products.name: Workspace Recovery
core_products.description: Provides temporary, fully equipped workspace environments, including private offices and meeting rooms, to enable continued business operations during crises or planned inaccessibility.

core_products.name: Backup Technology & Equipment
core_products.description: Offers end-to-end technology recovery, including secure internet connectivity (broadband, satellite, LTE/5G), data backup and recovery, and replacement IT hardware deployment.

core_products.name: Risk Planning & Testing
core_products.description: Services to identify vulnerabilities through detailed risk analysis, create tailored continuity plans, validate defenses with penetration testing, and ensure compliance with industry regulations.

core_products.name: Cyber Resilience
core_products.description: Comprehensive solutions for information security, data protection, cyberattack prevention, breach response, recovery support, and ransomware impact analysis.

core_products.name: Data Backup & Recovery
core_products.description: Instant recovery of data and systems by spinning up virtual machine replicas locally or in the cloud, featuring agent-based backup, support for 100+ operating systems, and military-grade encryption.

target_markets.ideal_customer_profile: Organizations across critical sectors that require robust, proven solutions to minimize downtime, protect sensitive data, ensure operational continuity, and maintain compliance in the face of natural disasters, cyberattacks, planned outages, or other disruptions.

sales_triggers.recent_news: No recent funding rounds or major news explicitly mentioned in provided data. Company founded in 1989 as the disaster recovery and business continuity division of General Electric.
sales_triggers.strategic_priorities: Focus on enhancing cybersecurity and resilience, ensuring compliance with industry regulations, minimizing costly downtime for critical operations, and providing comprehensive end-to-end technology recovery and high-bandwidth connectivity solutions.

impact_metrics.result: Bring any system back online in 15 minutes or less
Reopened in just hours after a devastating fire
High-speed, low-latency connections (up to 350 Mbps, 20–40ms latency)
Proven track record of 34+ years restoring operations for thousands of organizations
Able to care for patients even with servers down

green_flags: Over 35 years of experience in business continuity and disaster recovery, indicating deep expertise and reliability.
Offers a comprehensive suite of solutions (power, workspace, technology, planning, cyber resilience) providing a holistic approach to client needs.
Serves a diverse range of critical industries, demonstrating broad applicability and understanding of varied sector-specific requirements.
Strong emphasis on compliance and proven resilience, which is crucial for regulated industries.
red_flags: Specific compliance certifications (e.g., HIPAA, SOC2, ISO 27001) are mentioned generally as 'industry regulations' but not explicitly detailed, which might require further investigation for specific client requirements.

compliance_standards: Adherence to industry regulations (specifics like HIPAA, SOC2, ISO 27001 not explicitly detailed in provided data)
Military-grade encryption for data in transit and at rest
Code compliant and secure workspace recovery solutions
